text: phraxngkh̒ khụ̄x p̄hū̂thrng prathān khwām ngeīyb s̄ngb lng mā nı citcı k̄hxng brrdā p̄hū̂ ṣ̄rạthṭhā pheụ̄̀x phwk k̄heā ca dị̂ pheìmphūn kār ṣ̄rạthṭhā h̄ı̂ kạb kār ṣ̄rạthṭhā k̄hxng phwk k̄heā læa pĕn k̄hx ngxạllxḥˌ khụ̄x phịr̀phl h̄æ̀ng chận f̂ā thậngh̄lāy læa p̄hæ̀ndin læa xạllxḥˌ pĕn p̄hū̂thrng rxbrū̂ p̄hū̂thrng prīchā ỵāṇ s̄emx
